data.title: Bureau of Cannabis Control Announces CEQA Proposed Program Study Results and Public Workshop Meetings
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
data.excerpt: SACRAMENTO â€“ The Bureau of Cannabis Control released its California Environmental Quality Act (CEQA) Proposed Program study to the public today. As the lead agency under CEQA, the Bureau has prepared an Initial Study/Proposed Negative Declaration (IS/ND) for the Proposed Program. Based on the findings of the IS/ND, the Bureau has determined that the Proposed […]
